name: Knights and Knights
description:
Control the monsters of the level to kill this completely unknown knight, which name isn't at all Arthur.

arrows to move, space to spawn a monster and for abilities.

Each monster has its own speciality activated with space.

The wolf can jump

The zombie can throw up

The boss can ... be a big awsome flying ghosty death knight with a mask.

(actually the boss can attack)

Don't let this little knight pass the gate.

Made in 48 for Ludum Dare #33. Submission page here :

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=8002
